Description:
Identifies when a suppression rule is created in Azure. Adversary's could attempt this to evade detection.

Author: Austin Songer
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Azure Suppression Rule Created
Query: sourcetype='azure-activitylogs' eql select * from _source_ where operationname = 'microsoft.security/alertssuppressionrules/write'
